item.title: Our latest customer is Puddleducks
item.description: We’ve just announced that Puddleducks.ie is the latest customer of LouderVoice for Business. We’ll be making a lot more announcements like this in the coming weeks. Our small business solution is going live on multiple sites shortly. Contact us on business AT loudervoice DOT com if you’d like to arrange a trial. It can literally be implemented in minutes on many sites.
